import sys, os
sys.path.insert\(0, os.path.abspath\(''.''\)\)
from pstds.data.adapters import AlphaVantageAdapter
from pstds.temporal.context import TemporalContext
from datetime import date

adapter = AlphaVantageAdapter\(\)
ctx = TemporalContext.for_live\(date.today\(\)\)

# Test with different symbols to verify real API calls
for symbol in [''MSFT'', ''GOOGL'', ''TSLA'']:
    try:
        fundamentals = adapter.get_fundamentals\(symbol, date.today\(\), ctx\)
        pe = fundamentals.get\(''pe_ratio''\)
        pb = fundamentals.get\(''pb_ratio''\)
        print\(f''{symbol}: P/E={pe}, P/B={pb}''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''{symbol}: Error - {e}''\)
")

import sys, os
sys.path.insert\(0, os.path.abspath\(''.''\)\)
from pstds.data.adapters import AlphaVantageAdapter
from pstds.temporal.context import TemporalContext
from datetime import date

adapter = AlphaVantageAdapter\(\)
ctx = TemporalContext.for_live\(date.today\(\)\)

# Test news for different symbols
for symbol in [''TSLA'', ''NVDA'']:
    try:
        news_items = adapter.get_news\(symbol, days_back=2, ctx=ctx\)
        print\(f''{symbol}: {len\(news_items\)} news items''\)
        if news_items:
            latest = news_items[0]
            print\(f''  Latest: {latest.title[:60]}...''\)
    except Exception as e:
        print\(f''{symbol}: Error - {e}''\)
")
